Articles.Content:
i kinda disappeared off the forums for a while and stopped playing ksp all together after i got star citizen (i swear I'm not advertising) and i just saw someone say ksp has reached 1.0. can anyone shoot me a link or nutshell what has happened in the new update? plus I'm at school so i can't exactly go and check my desktop at home. so yeahhhhh.

thanks for any help!

- - - Updated - - -

wait. I'm pretty sure this is in the wrong section. can a admin throw it into the right one?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-01T15:41:04Z" title="05/01/2015 03:41  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 1, 2015</time> by jman508**

On the right near the top of the page from the forum index page: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/336-KSP-1-0-is-Released%21](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/336-KSP-1-0-is-Released%21). Changelog is included in the article.

Yep, that's the link you want.

Basically, a heck of a lot of stuff. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
